content.rendered:
Bird Prevention

Paratex has many years of experience in bird control. Every job is different and our ability to both design and install has allowed us to understand the balance of aesthetics and effectiveness. Our strength comes from our partnerships within the industry. Collaborating with multiple manufacturers gives us the ability to custom design a system that will perform for the life of the structure.

Our ability to both design and install has allowed us to understand the balance of aesthetics and effectiveness.

Rodent Exclusion

We share the Pacific Northwest with commensal animals and insects. This means they have adapted to live in the areas of our structures that we can not or do not regularly visit. Exclusion is the preferred method of pest control. The fact that rodents can access our homes and businesses through a hole the size of a dime takes a trained eye to see.

Residential

In order for our houses to not become a moldy mess they need to have airflow. Crawl spaces and attics both have vents to allow airflow. These are weak points that will be tested by rodents and birds. Inspection and repair are critical to prevent access.

Call us to schedule an evaluation, or send us photos!

If we can’t fix it we’ll tell you who can.

800-542-1234

Request an Evaluation Online
